id.description: Unique identifier for the account

master_id.description: The id of the parent account (if this is a subaccount)

type.description:
Account type. Must be one of:
1 = SCHEDULING
2 = ATTENDANCE
3 = BOTH

logo.description: Path to the image file for the company's logo

company.description: Name of the company for which this account is in use

subdomain.description: Subdomain of wheniwork.com to access company-specific When I Work web application

enabled.description: Whether this account object is enabled

plan_expires.description: Date and time when the plan for the current account expires

timezone_id.description: Identifier for time zone specified at: http://php.net/manual/en/class.datetimezone.php

timezone_name.description: Name for the timezone specified in the timezone_id

settings.description: A list of settings for this account

id.description: Unique identifier for the shift

user_id.description: Link identifier for the User attached to this shift. 0 means OpenShift.

location_id.description: Link identifier for the Location to which this shift is attached.

position_id.description: Link identifier for the Position attached to this shift.

site_id.description: Link identifier for the Site attached to this shift.

color.description: Hex color used to identify the shift in the UI.

notes.description: Notes about the shift. Max length 350.

published_date.description: Date the shift was most recently published.

notified_at.description: Date the shift was most recently notified.

created_at.description: Date at which the shift was created.

updated_at.description: Date the shift was most recently updated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user.

email.description: The email address of this user.

phone_number.description: The phone number of this user.

hours_preferred.description: The preferred number of hours for the user.

hours_max.description: Max hours this user can work.

hourly_rate.description: The hourly rate for this user.

role.description:
The user's role.
1 = Admin
2 = Manager
3 = Employee (Default)
4 = Lead (Unused)
5 = Supervisor
6 = View Only

positions.description: An array of positions to be assigned to the user.

locations.description: An array of locations to be applied to the user.

activated.description: Whether the manager has activated this user.

password.description: Set a password, but only on user creation, not update. (write only)

id.description: The unique id of the location.

created_at.description: The date the location was created.

updated_at.description: The last time the location was updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the site.

location_id.description: The ID of the location that the site belongs to.

address.value: 1600 S Azusa Ave, City of Industry, CA 91748

coordinates.description: The new coordinates for the site, as an array of comma separated values.

id.description: The unique ID of the position.

account_id.description: The ID of the account that the position belongs to.

color.description: The position's color in the schedule.

created_at.description: Date at which the position was created.

updated_at.description: Date the position was most recently updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the shift block.

account_id.description: The ID of the account the shift block is attached to.

location_id.description: The ID of the location the shift block is for.

position_id.description: The ID of the position that the shift is designated for.

start_time.description: The start time for the shift block.

end_time.description: The end time for the shift block.

color.description: The hexadecimal value of the color for the shift block.

break_time.description: The unpaid break time (in hours) for the shift block

created_at.description: Date at which the shift block was created.

updated_at.description: Date the shift block was most recently updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the availability.

account_id.description: The ID of the account that this user's availability is tied to.

user_id.description: The ID of the user tied to the availability.

start_date.description: The starting date of the time period the availability is designated for.

end_date.description: The ending date of the time period the availability is designated for.

ongoing.description: Is the availability the user's ongoing availability.

created_at.description: Date at which the availability was created.

updated_at.description: Date the availability was most recently updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the availability item

availability_id.description: The ID of the availability object the item is associated with.

user_id.description: The ID of the user that the availability item is associated with.

day.description: The day of the week (0-6) for the availability item.

type.description: The type of the availability item. (1 = Preferred, 2 = Unavailable)

start_time.description: The start time of the availability for the specified day.

end_time.description: The end time of the availability for the specified day.

created_at.description: Date at which the availability item was created.

updated_at.description: Date the availability item was most recently updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the message.

account_id.description: The account ID that the message is associated with.

request_id.description: The ID of the request the message is for.

swap_id.description: The ID of the swap the message is for.

conversation_id.description: The ID of the conversation the message is a part of.

created_at.description: Date at which the message was created.

updated_at.description: Date the message was most recently updated.

ids.description: An array of user IDs to send the email to.

subject.description: The subject of the email notification.

message.value: We have an open shift available on Tuesday from 1:00 PM to 10:00 PM

id.description: The unique ID of the swap.

account_id.description: The ID of the account associated with the swap.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who initiated the swap.

type.description: The type of swap. (1 = swap, 2 = drop, 3 = alert)

status.description: The status of the swap. (0 = Pending, 1 = Approved, 2 = Declined, 3 = Completed, 4 = Canceled, 5 = Expired)

accepted_id.description: The ID of the user who took the shift

statuses.description: An array of user shift acceptance statuses.

id.description: The unique ID of the template.

account_id.description: The ID of the account the template belongs to.

location_id.description: The location ID for the shift template.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who created the template.

start_date.description: The start date for the template.

end_date.description: The start date for the template.

description.value: Our weekly schedule for December - March.

created_at.description: The date and time the template was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the template was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the template shift.

template_id.description: The ID of the template that the template shift is a part of.

user_id.description: The ID of the user assigned to the template shift.

location_id.description: The ID of the location associated with the template shift.

position_id.description: The ID of the position associated with the template shift.

site_id.description: The ID of the site associated with the template shift.

start_time.description: Start time of the template shift.

end_time.description: End time of the template shift.

break_time.description: Number of unpaid hours allotted for a break during the shift.

color.description: The hexadecimal color value that the shift shows up as in the scheduler.

notes.description: A note for the associated template shift.

linked_users.description: A json encoded string of users that are eligible for the shift.

id.description: The unique ID of the request.

account_id.description: The ID of the account this request belongs to.

creator_id.description: The ID of the user creating the request.

created_at.description: The date and time the request was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the request was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID of the plan.

price_annual.description: The annual cost of the plan.

employees.description: The number of employees allowed on the plan.

texting.description: Is texting allowed on this account

sort.description: The sort order of the plan.

id.description: The unique ID for this payroll item.

account_id.description: The account ID that this payroll item belongs to.

creator_id.description: The user ID of the person who created the payroll item.

start_date.description: The start date of the payroll period,

end_date.description: The start date of the payroll period,

is_closed.description: True if the payroll period is closed

is_finalized.description: True if the payroll period has been finalized.

finalized_at.description: The date and time that the payroll period was finalized.

created_at.description: The date and time the payroll period was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the payroll period was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID for this payrollhours item.

payroll_id.description: The ID of the payroll item this payrollhours object belongs to.

type.description: The type of hours being reported. (1=Regular, 2=OT, 3=PTO, 4=Holiday, 5=Double Time, 6=Sick)

user_id.description: The ID of the user who these hours belong to.

position_id.description: The ID of the position that is associated with these hours.

rate.description: The hourly rate paid for these hours.

total.description: The total wages for these hours.

id.description: The unique ID for this time entry.

account_id.description: The ID of the account this entry is associated with.

user_id.description: The ID of the user that this time entry is for.

creator_id.description: The ID of the user who created this time entry.

position_id.description: The ID of the position that is associated with this entry.

location_id.description: The ID of the location that is associated with this entry.

site_id.description: The ID of the site that is associated with this time entry.

shift_id.description: The ID of the shift that correlates to this time entry.

start_time.description: The start date and time of the time entry.

end_time.description: End time of the time entry.

length.description: The length of the time entry. (readonly)

hourly_rate.description: Hourly rate for this time entry.

is_alerted.description: True if an alert needs to be created for this shift.

is_approved.description: True if the time entry has been approved.

modified_by.description: The ID of the user who modified the time entry.

created_at.description: The date and time the time entry was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the time entry was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID for this punch.

account_id.description: The ID of the account that this punch is associated with.

time_id.description: The ID of the time object this punch is connected to.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who punched in or out.

location_id.description: The ID of the location that the punch is for.

site_id.description: The ID of the site that the punch is for.

type.description: Type of punch. (1 = Punch In, 2 = Punch Out)

accuracy.description: How close the user was to a location.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the device on which the punch occurred.

is_alerted.description: True if an alert needs to be created for this punch.

created_at.description: The date and time the punch was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the punch was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID for this annotation.

account_id.description: The ID of the account that this annotation is tied to.

creator_id.description: ID of the user who originally created the annotation.

all_locations.description: Determines if this annotation applies to all locations on the account.

start_date.description: ISO8601 timestamp of when the annotation's range begins.

end_date.description: ISO8601 timestamp of when the annotation's range ends.

message.value: We are closed while we have the Minneapolis Store painted.

color.description: Hex color code to represent this annotation (optional).

location_id.description: INPUT ONLY: include location_id parameter when listing, creating, or updating annotations.

locations.description: OUTPUT ONLY: If all_locations = false, this field will contain an array of related location objects in the response body.

created_at.description: The date and time the punch was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time the punch was last updated.

id.description: The unique ID for this login object

first_name.description: The first name of the user

last_name.description: The last name of the user

email.description: The email address of the user

timeoff.description: Whether the user wishes to receive alerts when time off requests change status.

swaps.description: Whether the user wishes to receive alerts when a swap or drop changes status.

schedule.description: Whether the user wishes to receive alerts when the schedule changes.

newemployee.description: Whether the user wishes to receive alerts when a new employee is added.

availability.description: Whether the user wishes to receive alerts for changes in availability.

reminders.description: Whether the user wishes to receive alerts for reminders prior to shifts.

reminder_time.description: Time before an event that a user should be sent notifications, in hours.

sms.description: Whether or not SMS messages should be sent for events of this alert type.

email.description: Whether or not email messages should be sent for events of this alert type.

phone_number.description: User's phone number for SMS messages
